borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: 10067	Acer pseudoplatanus (Sycamore) - End-weight reduction - approx. 4m length from lowest branch to north (removing upper, end section ) to releive mechanical loading and manage risk of harm through branch failure.	10134	Ailanthus altissima (Tree Of Heaven)	 - Fell - Ground level due to evident physiological decline.		10869	Davidia involucrata (Dove Tree/Handkerchief Tree) - Fell - Ground level and grub out.	10778	Robinia pseudoacacia (False Acacia sp./Black Locust) - Reduce height - approx. 4m to remove declining upper crown and reduce mechanical loading.10792	Eucalyptus  sp. (Eucalyptus Tree) - Pollard - Previous pollard height to manage risk of harm or damage through failure of extended regrowth, continuing established management.		10791	Pinus wallichiana (Bhutan Pine) - Lift low canopy - Pedestrian clearance over footpath and fence/gate. Reduce length by up to 1m to relieve mechanical loading and lift branch abov fenc. Final cut to be at suitable growth point retaining furnishing growth to minimise visual impact. Final cut to be <5cm diameter.		10541	Malus tschonoskii (Pillar Apple) - Formative prune - Structural remove/reduce rubbing limbs, remove deadwood.		10799	Eucalyptus  sp. (Eucalyptus Tree) - Pollard - Previous pollard height to manage risk of harm or damage through failure of extended regrowth, continuing established management.		10545	Aesculus hippocastanum (Horse Chestnut) - End-weight reduction - Specified extent	"of extended southern limbs over lawn by approximately 2-3m to relieve mechanical loading and manage risk of harm or damage through branch faliure. Final cuts to be less than 8 cm diameter at suitable growth points leavng furnishing growth to minimise visual impact."		10482	Laburnum anagyroides (Common Laburnum (Golden Chain)) - Fell - Ground level and grub out
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
